text.autoconfig.signfinder.title: SignFinder Settings
text.autoconfig.signfinder.option.defaul: The default radius in blocks to search for signs when using search commands.
text.autoconfig.signfinder.option.max_re: Maximum number of search results to display per page.
text.autoconfig.signfinder.option.text_p: Length of the text preview shown in search results.
text.autoconfig.signfinder.option.enable: Automatically highlight signs and item frames that contain container-related keywords.
Enable visual highlighting of signs and item frames.
text.autoconfig.signfinder.option.auto_r: Automatically remove highlights when approaching highlighted targets.
Distance in blocks at which highlights are automatically removed when approaching targets.
text.autoconfig.signfinder.option.clear_: Clear all search result highlights when approaching any highlighted target (instead of just the approached one).
text.autoconfig.signfinder.option.sign_h: Color used to highlight signs and item frames.
text.autoconfig.signfinder.option.highli: Transparency level for highlight boxes (10=very transparent, 255=opaque).

Controls how SignFinder will highlight entities.
Boxes only: Entities will be highlighted with a colored box around them.
Lines only: Entities will be highlighted with a line going from your crosshair to the entity.
Lines and boxes: Both of the above.
text.autoconfig.signfinder.option.export:
Controls which format to use for export.
Text: plain text format.
JSON: JSON format.
text.autoconfig.signfinder.option.case_s: Whether searches and auto detection should be case sensitive.
text.autoconfig.signfinder.option.ignore: List of words to ignore during auto detection. Signs and item frames containing these words will not be highlighted automatically.
text.autoconfig.signfinder.option.contai: Keywords for auto detecting and highlighting signs and item frames containing specific content. Leave empty to disable auto detection.
text.autoconfig.signfinder.option.auto_h: Automatically highlight signs and item frames when they match auto detection keywords.
text.autoconfig.signfinder.option.auto_s: Automatically save detected signs and item frames to JSON files for future reference.
text.autoconfig.signfinder.option.always: Always include local cached data in search results (shown after live results). If disabled, local data is only shown when no live results are found.
text.autoconfig.signfinder.option.auto_s: Time interval in seconds between automatic saves of detection data.

How to save auto-detection data:
Auto Overwrite: Update existing data by coordinates and time
New File: Create new file each time
Daily Split: One file per day, overwrite within same day
text.autoconfig.signfinder.option.entity: Controls which entities to search: signs only, item frames only, or both signs and item frames.
text.autoconfig.signfinder.option.search: Predefined search queries for quick access.
signfinder.help.use_quotes: Tip: Use quotes for queries with Chinese characters, spaces, or special characters: findsign "your query"
signfinder.error.no_search_results: No search results, please execute search first
signfinder.message.preset_usage_help:
No presets found. Add presets:
• Text: /findsign <query> <radius> <preset_name>
• Regex: /findsign regex <pattern> <radius> <preset_name>
signfinder.message.preset_usage_tip: Click preset name to use quickly, or use /findsign preset <name>
signfinder.message.no_matching_signs: No matching signs found (search range: %d blocks)
signfinder.message.search_results_title: === Sign Search Results (%d signs, range: %d blocks) ===
signfinder.tooltip.change_color: Cycle through highlight colors for this entity
signfinder.message.color_changed_to: Changed color for sign at %d, %d, %d to
signfinder.export.no_cache: No search results cached, exporting all %s within %d blocks
signfinder.search.all_signs: Searching for all signs within %d blocks...
signfinder.message.export_reminder: Too many results? Export to file for easier viewing!
signfinder.tooltip.local_data_desc: This data comes from local cache. The target may be in an unloaded area.
